from cangkuguanli where bianhao = #{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 0,1

select from cangkuguanli where 1=1
and bianhao =#{bianhao}

select from cangkuguanli where 1=1 and bianhao like concat('%',#{bianhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and mima like concat('%',#{mima,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xingming like concat('%',#{xingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and xingbie like concat('%',#{xingbie,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and nianling like concat('%',#{nianling,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and gongzhong like concat('%',#{gongzhong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and ruzhishijian like concat('%',#{ruzhishijian,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and beizhu like concat('%',#{beizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') order by id desc
limit #{pageno},#{pageSize}
